summary.overview: This JCL job recreates the customer data storage infrastructure by removing any existing customer data file structure and establishing a new indexed VSAM cluster for efficient customer information storage and retrieval.
business_functions: Delete existing customer data file structure to ensure clean setup
Create new indexed VSAM cluster for customer data storage with 500-byte fixed records
Establish 10-byte key indexing system for efficient customer record retrieval
Configure shared access capabilities allowing multiple users to read customer data simultaneously
Set up scalable storage allocation with automatic expansion capabilities

DEFCUST.jcl.program_overview: IBM Access Method Services utility for VSAM dataset management operations

datasource_summary.name: Legacy Customer Data Cluster (AWS.CCDA.CUSTDATA.CLUSTER)
datasource_summary.function: Legacy customer data storage cluster that is being removed from the system to prepare for redefinition with updated specifications

datasource_summary.name: Customer Data Cluster (AWS.CUSTDATA.CLUSTER)
datasource_summary.function: Primary customer data storage cluster with 10-character key structure, 500-byte records, supporting shared read access with exclusive updates for customer information management

datasource_summary.name: Customer Data Component (AWS.CUSTDATA.CLUSTER.DATA)
datasource_summary.function: Data storage component that contains the actual customer records within the customer data cluster

datasource_summary.name: Customer Data Index Component (AWS.CUSTDATA.CLUSTER.INDEX)
datasource_summary.function: Index component that provides efficient keyed access to customer records for fast data retrieval and navigation
